'''Hornvale''' is a castle in [[the Westerlands]], the region controlled by [[House Lannister]] of [[Casterly Rock]]. The castle is located in the center of the region, among the mountains east of Casterly Rock. It is south of [[Golden Tooth]], near the headwaters of the [[Trident|Red Fork]].<ref>[http://viewers-guide.hbo.com/game-of-thrones/season1/#!/locations/casterly-rock/ HBO viewers guide, season 1 map, Casterly Rock entry]</ref>
sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, Hornvale is the seat of House Brax, a loyal vassal house of the Lannisters.
